result.execSummary:
The defendant Loretta Jean Pobjoy was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Loretta Jean Pobjoy is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Loretta Jean Pobjoy was found guilty of Possession of THC [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Order for Fees per statement submitted by Atty Lawton
Columbia County Court Conviction DNA - DNA taken

Cases called: 15CM467 & 15CT240, Defendant Loretta Jean Pobjoy in court with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count one in 15CM467. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence: $673.50 fine, 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts. Ct. 2 dismissed. No jail credit.  15CT240 - defendant has gotten her license. Atty. Lawton to contact ADA Long for disposition.  Review scheduled for May 18, 2016 at 07:45 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 18, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Attorney Mark D. Lawton appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Cases called: 15CM467, and 15CT240. Authorization to be filed by atty Lawton in 10 days.  Not guilty pleas entered on behalf of defendant.  Not guilty plea entered by court.  To be set for jury trial.
For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by Atty Long
and Notice of DNA and Witness List filed by Atty Long

Court called 3:10 PM. Defendant, Loretta Jean Pobjoy, appeared. Petition is reviewed. Court finds defendant conditionally indigent and appoints Atty Mark Lawton (also on case #15CT240). Def to pay $25/mo starting 11/15/2015.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Return date scheduled for December 11, 2015 at 02:45 pm. Court adjourned 3:23 PM.
